mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, updatedate, fix, replyCnt from board where bno > 0 order by fix desc, bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, updatedate = now() where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(bno) from board where bno > 0
mapper.update: update board set replyCnt = replyCnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
